body.p: The text of the unaccompanied standard, IAS 7, is contained in Part A of this edition. Its effective date when issued was 1 January 1994. The text of the Basis for Conclusions on IAS 7 is contained in Part C of this edition. This part presents the following documents:

ol.li:
ILLUSTRATIVE EXAMPLES
A Statement of cash flows for an entity other than a financial institution
B Statement of cash flows for a financial institution
C Reconciliation of liabilities arising from financing activities
